data.name: Hotel Transylvania 3: Monsters Overboard
data.detailed_description:
Summary


Dracula, Mavis and their monster friends are marooned on the mysterious Lost Islands – and only you, in command of lovable little creatures, the Impa, can save them! Explore the islands, discover new Impa abilities, and rescue Frankenstein, Murray and Wayne from fearsome enemies. But hurry – the Drac-Pack’s lives are at stake!

Key Features:


• Join Dracula, Mavis and the gang on a Monster New Adventure

• A mysterious storm has washed the Drac-pack overboard and only you can save the missing monsters

• Explore the legendary lost islands and collect secret treasure

• Meet new friends and battle dangerous enemies

• Reunite the Drac-pack and save the day in this hilarious new adventure

Explore the islands, discover new Impa abilities, and rescue Frankenstein, Murray and Wayne from fearsome enemies. But hurry – the Drac-Pack’s lives are at stake!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
data.reviews:
“Hotel Transylvania 3: Monsters Overboard is great for kids and those who like both the movies and Pikmin.”
7/10 – GamePitt

“This review request was driven by my kids, but I’m thankful they pushed me towards it because Hotel Transylvania 3: Monsters Overboard is a fantastic experience on the system.”
8/10 – Game Reviews

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3220 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or Nvidia GeForce GT640
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX750 Ti or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
